label: A2B3C18D6_hP58_192_c_f_lm_l-001
title: Beryl (Be$_{3}$Al$_{2}$Si$_{6}$O$_{18}$, $S3_{1}$) Structure
comments:
(Morosin, 1972) places oxygen atoms on the (2a) Wyckoff site, with lattice coordinates $(0,0,\pm\frac14)$ and an occupation of (0.0991). We follow (Hazen, 1986) and ignore this small contribution to the structure. 
 We originally followed (Ewald, 1931) and gave this the {\em Strukturbericht} designation $G3_{1}$.  However, (Hermann, 1937) relabeled is as $S3_{1}$ to keep it with the rest of the silicate structures.
